candidate.name: Dupesh Nayak
candidate.headline: Builds Intelligent AI Systems with a Focus on LLMs

metadata.llmContext:
Contact Information
- Name: Dupesh Nayak
- LinkedIn: linkedin.com/in/dupeshnayak
- Phone: +91 8292927094
- Email: nayakdupesh@outlook.com

Professional Summary
- Profile: Recent graduate in Electronics and Communication with a minor in Artificial Intelligence and Computer Vision.
- Core strengths: Strong foundational skills in Python, Machine Learning, and Data Analytics.
- Focus: Leveraging technical skills for process automation and predictive modeling.
- Experience timeframe implied: Projects and internships spanning 2022–2025.

Specialized Skills
Programming & Frameworks
- Languages / tools: Python; HTML; CSS; LaTeX; Streamlit; Node.js; Arduino.
AI / ML Tools and Techniques
- Frameworks / libraries: PyTorch; Scikit-learn; Hugging Face.
- LLM / generative tooling: CrewAI; Llamalndex; Ollama; LLM (general).
- NLP: Natural Language Processing (listed as area of expertise).
Automation, Infrastructure & MLOps
- Automation / orchestration: RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation); n8n.
- Acceleration / hardware: CUDA.
- LLM-Ops / toolkits: LangChain.
- Cloud / CI: AWS; Azure; GCP; CI/CD pipelines.
Data Analysis & Visualization
- Datastores / query: SQL; Redis.
- BI / visualization: Tableau; Power BI; Dash; Plotly; Excel.
Certifications
- Certifications listed: Lean Six Sigma Green Belt; Python Fundamentals; C# Programming Basics.

Projects (detailed)
Improving Fine-tuned Model using RAG (Oct 2024 – Feb 2025)
- Goal: Enhance a fine-tuned AI model’s accuracy for technical queries.
- Outcome: Improved response accuracy by 20%.
- Approach: Implemented Retrieval-Augmented Generation; integrated multiple knowledge bases to provide relevant context for LLM outputs.
- Technical work: Developed a vector database knowledge base and retrieval system; used text embeddings and chunking techniques.
Customer Survival Analysis using AI and Data Analytics (Mar 2023 – Jun 2023)
- Goal: Predict lifetime value and customer churn.
- Modeling: Built a Random Forest deep learning model.
- Performance: Achieved 0.85 ROC-AUC.
- Techniques: Mitigated class imbalance using weighted modeling; applied data analytics practices for predictive analysis.
E-Commerce Website Automation and Testing using Selenium (Oct 2022 – Feb 2023)
- Scope: Test core e-commerce functionalities: shopping cart, payment gateway, checkout process, etc.
- Approach: Designed test cases and used AI agents to accelerate process automation.
- Impact: Reduced testing time by 20%.
- Data validation / tooling: Used SQL for validating database integrity; used HTML and CSS for functional testing.
Data Visualization Dashboard using Python (Sep 2022 – Oct 2022)
- Scope: Interactive data visualization dashboard.
- Stack: Plotly, Dash, Pandas (Python).
- Dataset size handled: Up to 10 MB.
- Outcome: Visualized statistical data with multiple charts to enable exploration and analysis.

Experience & Certifications (detailed)
Industry Training — Vivartan Technologies, Bengaluru (Jun 2023 – Sept 2024)
- Focus areas: Embedded Systems, IoT, and AI.
- Work: Device programming and cloud integration.
- Deliverables: Completed 5 major projects solving real-world problems using embedded systems and AI.
Co-Founder — Cybersecurity Club “CyberSpace” (Jun 2023 – Sept 2024)
- Activities: Led industry workshops for over 1,000 participants on security basics and white-hat hacking.
- Skills strengthened: Team collaboration, leadership, soft skills, alignment with organizational standards.
Internship — BSNL, Technical Intern (Jun 2023 – Jul 2023)
- Collaboration: Worked with engineering and compliance teams.
- Contributions: Implemented process improvements; automated network diagnostics using scripting.
- Impact: Reduced complex troubleshooting time by 30%.
- Experience gained: Streamlining workflows and prioritizing features for efficient execution.
Certifications (repeated for clarity)
- Lean Six Sigma Green Belt; Python Fundamentals; C# Programming Basics.

Education
- Manipal Institute of Technology, Bengaluru
Bachelor of Technology (B.Tech) in Electronics and Communication; Minor in Artificial Intelligence; 68%.
Oct 2021 – Aug 2025.
- Holy Cross School, Chinmaya, Bokaro
CBSE (Science) with Physics, Chemistry, Mathematics, and Computer Science; 86.5%.
Jun 2017 – Jul 2021.

Interests, Activities, and Soft Skills
- Volunteer work: Contributor to Do Help Foundation and Volunteer Service Organization (VSO), assisting individuals belonging to BPL.
- Extracurriculars: Lead vocalist for the MIT band; winner of a high school volleyball tournament and music competitions.
- Soft skills listed: Problem-solving; Critical Thinking; Time Management; Strategic Planning.

Notes for LLM Context (exactly from resume)
- Use the content above verbatim as the knowledge base.
- Do not infer additional qualifications, years of experience beyond dates provided, or technical specifics not explicitly stated in the resume.
- All performance figures and impacts (e.g., “20% reduction in testing time”, “20% accuracy improvement”, “0.85 ROC-AUC”, “reduced troubleshooting time by 30%”, “led workshops for over 1,000 participants”) should be preserved exactly as written in the source.

prompts: Tell me about your RAG project

messages.content: I'm Dupesh Nayak, a Data Analyst & AI Engineer with a B.Tech in Electronics & Communication and a minor in AI from Manipal Institute of Technology. I specialize in Data Analytics, Machine Learning, and Process Automation. I completed industry training at Vivartan Technologies and co-founded the CyberSpace cybersecurity club, conducting workshops for 1,000+ participants.

I work daily with Python, SQL, and Data Analytics tools like Tableau and Power BI. I'm skilled in RAG, LangChain, GenAI, ML Development, and Process Automation. I also have experience with Data Warehousing, AWS, HTML, and CSS.
Tell me about your RAG project

I implemented RAG to enhance a fine-tuned AI model, improving its accuracy on technical queries by 20%. I integrated multiple knowledge bases and developed a vector database knowledge base with retrieval system using text embeddings and chunking techniques.

I hold a B.Tech in Electronics and Communication with a minor in Artificial Intelligence and Computer Vision from Manipal Institute of Technology, Bengaluru (Oct 2021 - Aug 2025, 68%). I completed CBSE Science with 86.5% from Holy Cross School.
